channel.title: MySQL connection?
channel.description:
I'm running Ubuntu and I have installed and setup MySQL. I've checked canyouseeme.org and port 3306 comes out as open. I can also even access phpmyadmin from another network. http://63.147.8.102/phpmyadmin/
Although, if I try to PING or connect to the address, it never connects. Is there something else I need to setup?

item.title: MySQL connection?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I’m running Ubuntu and I have installed and setup MySQL. I’ve checked canyouseeme.org and port 3306 comes out as open. I can also even access phpmyadmin from another network. http://63.147.8.102/phpmyadmin/

Although, if I try to PING or connect to the address, it never connects. Is there something else I need to setup?

Read full topic
